mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE CS_CPNS_TYP_CD_HIERARCHY AS /* csCpnsTypCd.getRewardTypeList */ ( SELECT 1 AS LEVEL , CPNS_TYP_NO , CPNS_TYP_NM , USE_YN , SORT_SEQ , UPR_CPNS_TYP_CD , CONCAT('\',SORT_SEQ||CPNS_TYP_NO) AS HIERARCHY , CONCAT('',CPNS_TYP_NM) AS HIERARCHY_TEXT FROM CS_CPNS_TYP_CD A WHERE CPNS_TYP_NO = '0' UNION ALL SELECT LEVEL + 1 AS LEVEL , T1.CPNS_TYP_NO , T1.CPNS_TYP_NM , T1.USE_YN , T1.SORT_SEQ , T1.UPR_CPNS_TYP_CD , CONCAT_WS('\', T2.HIERARCHY, TRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.SORT_SEQ,'000'))||T1.CPNS_TYP_NO) AS HIERARCHY , CONCAT('',T2.HIERARCHY_TEXT,'>'||T1.CPNS_TYP_NM) AS HIERARCHY_TEXT FROM CS_CPNS_TYP_CD T1 , CS_CPNS_TYP_CD_HIERARCHY T2 WHERE T2.CPNS_TYP_NO = T1.UPR_CPNS_TYP_CD AND T1.USE_YN LIKE #{useYn} || '%' ) SELECT LEVEL , CPNS_TYP_NO , CPNS_TYP_NM , USE_YN , SORT_SEQ , UPR_CPNS_TYP_CD , HIERARCHY , HIERARCHY_TEXT FROM CS_CPNS_TYP_CD_HIERARCHY ORDER BY HIERARCHY, SORT_SEQ
mapper.sql: SELECT /* csCpnsTypCd.rewardTypeList */ CPNS_TYP_NO , #{level} + 1 AS LEVEL , CPNS_TYP_NM , USE_YN , SORT_SEQ , CPNS_SUB_CD , CPNS_STD_CD , CPNS_STD_RATE , MAX_PAY_LIM , CPNS_STD_DESC , CASE WHEN CPNS_STD_DESC IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN CPNS_STD_DESC = '' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS CPNS_STD_DESC_YN , UPR_CPNS_TYP_CD , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM CS_CPNS_TYP_CD WHERE UPR_CPNS_TYP_CD = #{uprCpnsTypCd} AND USE_YN LIKE #{useYn} || '%' ORDER BY SORT_SEQ

SELECT CCTC.CPNS_TYP_NO /* csCpnsTypCd.csCpnsTypCdPopup */ , (SELECT TMP.CPNS_TYP_NM FROM CS_CPNS_TYP_CD AS TMP WHERE TMP.CPNS_TYP_NO = CCTC.UPR_CPNS_TYP_CD) AS CPNS_TYP_LRG_NM , CCTC.CPNS_TYP_NM AS CPNS_TYP_SML_NM , CCTC.CPNS_SUB_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME( 'CS017', CCTC.CPNS_SUB_CD ) AS CPNS_SUB_NM , CCTC.CPNS_STD_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME( 'CS018', CCTC.CPNS_STD_CD ) AS CPNS_STD_NM , CCTC.CPNS_STD_RATE , CCTC.MAX_PAY_LIM FROM CS_CPNS_TYP_CD CCTC WHERE CCTC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CCTC.UPR_CPNS_TYP_CD != '0' AND CCTC.UPR_CPNS_TYP_CD IS NOT NULL AND CCTC.CPNS_TYP_NM LIKE #{cpnsTypNm} || '%' ORDER BY UPR_CPNS_TYP_CD, SORT_SEQ
